segments.text: Jane , I was wondering if you you had any plans for saturday afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A friend and I are planing to go out , why ? what's up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is a special exhibition of french sculptures at the museum , I was hoping you ' d like to come with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am afraid I can't I am going to be out all day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish I could , but it's my mums birthday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Much as I ' d like to , I am afraid i wont be free next week , I have a lot of work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry to hear that , I was really looking forward to spending some more time with you , I really enjoyed our last chat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am really sorry too , maybe I can give you a call sometime .
segments.speaker: S2
